title: unesco_heritage_Abu_Mena
text:
Name: Abu Mena. short_description:

The church, baptistry, basilicas, public buildings, streets, monasteries, houses and workshops in this early Christian holy city were built over the tomb of the martyr Menas of Alexandria, who died in A.D. 296.

. date_inscribed: 1979. danger: 1. date_end: . longitude: 29.66666667. latitude: 30.83583333. area_hectares: 182.72. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Egypt. Region: Arab States. iso_code: eg. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
